markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs=""
>
[Fearsome Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=4093) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200)

**Prerequisites**
[Ursine Avenger Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4086)

</column>

---

Your claws and jaws are brutally powerful and efficient, even by ursine standards. The base damage of your jaws unarmed attack from Ursine Avenger Form increases to 1d12. The base damage of your claws unarmed attack from Ursine Avenger Form increases to 1d8.
name: Fearsome Fangs
